title: David Stephenson (born 1972)
text:
David Stephenson (born 6 October 1972) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1990s and 2000s. He played at club level for <a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham Bears</a>, <a href="Hull%20F.C.">Hull Sharks</a> and <a href="Rochdale%20Hornets">Rochdale Hornets</a>, as a , or .
He started his career with Milford Marlins and Queens when he represented Great Britain under 18/s against the Australian schoolboys in 1991 winning the man of the match award.
He played an off-season in Australia in 1993, with <a href="Barrie%20McDermott">Barrie McDermott</a>, for <a href="Wyong%20Roos">Wyong Roos</a>.
A tough uncompromising player who was a fans favourite at each club he played at.
After retiring he returned to his first junior club Milford Marlins coaching
